name: Avoid unreferenced views
description: List of schema views that are not called
output:
this report lists all unreferenced views .
It provides the following information:

- View name
- View fullname
rationale:
Unreferenced views may be the symptom of Dead Code. And dead Code must be avoided as it makes source code less readable and increases the cost of the software maintenance. A view is flagged as unreferenced when it is not called.

Warning:
Unreference code can also be the symptoms of missing code (code not included in the source code analysis) and / or can be the symptom of use of polymorphism.
remediation:
inspect code, check it is truly unnecessary.
Remove views  that are not used.
total: Number of views stored in the schema

qualityStandards.name: Unreachable Named Callable or Method Control Element
qualityStandards.description:
Objective
Avoid inactive code blocks that can mistakenly be considered as active and that can hide the active code in noise

Consequence
Software that does not follow the principles of reuse requires more maintenance effort in order to propagate changes to all instances of duplicated code

Measure Element
Number of instances where a named callable control element or method control element is unreferenced by any other code item in the application (the application determines the scope of the search for code items that could call a callable or method control element)
